headline: Cummins (CMI) Is Down 7.4% After Issuing 2026 Revenue and Margin Guidance - What's Changed
summary: Cummins Inc. recently reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing sales of US$8,536 million and net income of US$593 million, alongside full-year 2025 sales of US$33.67 billion and earnings per share of about US$20.50 from continuing operations. At the same time, Cummins issued 2026 guidance calling for revenue to grow by 3% to 8% and EBITDA margins of 17.0% to 18.0% of sales, underscoring the importance of data center backup power demand and its plans to invest while returning cash to...
